desc: Romania is one of the largest producers of wine, but nevertheless very few people know about this undiscovered gem. The quality of Romanian wine is far above its international recognition. We deliver Romanian Premium Red Wine, White Wine, Rose Wine directly to your home.

layout.text:
Romania is one of the largest producers of wine, but nevertheless very few people know about this undiscovered gem.
The quality of Romanian wine is far above its international recognition.
We sell the taste, the story, not the label.
